# 35岁程序员的退路：量化投资学习笔记 20210730

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/x35-sui-chengxuyuan-de-tuilu-lianghua-touzi-xuexi-biji-20210730
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/x35-sui-chengxuyuan-de-tuilu-lianghua-touzi-xuexi-biji-20210730
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install x35-sui-chengxuyuan-de-tuilu-lianghua-touzi-xuexi-biji-20210730
x35-sui-chengxuyuan-de-tuilu-lianghua-touzi-xuexi-biji-20210730 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xsanwu-sui-chengxuyuan-de-tuilu-lianghua-touzi-xuexi-biji-erlingeryilingqisanling
xsanwu-sui-chengxuyuan-de-tuilu-lianghua-touzi-xuexi-biji-erlingeryilingqisanling <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
